title: WATCH: ESPN reporter causes horrific cheerleader accident
text:
At the Houston–Washington State game on Saturday night, a female cheerleader took a nasty fall after she was dropped by a male cheerleader after he was bumped by a reporter attempting to avoid a player who had rolled out of bounds:

In slow-motion:

The reporter at fault here is ESPN’s Paul Carcaterra:

Dude, you can’t let your cheer team member crash like that!#WSUvsHOU pic.twitter.com/Xh9rg33N0w — Doug9586 (@doug9586) September 14, 2019

Twitter user @anne_cara, identified as the cheerleader who took the fall, thankfully wasn’t seriously hurt:

Just a sore body and a bad headache! Very thankful it wasnt worse — cara (@anne_cara) September 14, 2019

Well, that’s the least he could do:

He came to check on me after I got checked out by staff — cara (@anne_cara) September 14, 2019

***
